rect.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 0px; paint-order: fill markers; fill: rgb(255, 165, 0);
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill markers; fill: rgb(230, 149, 0); fill-rule: nonzero; stroke-width: 0px;

text.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 74.9px; font-style: italic; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 74.9px; font-style: italic; white-space: pre;
